replies.msg:
Besiktas boss Senol Gunes has suggested that Liverpool have secured an agreement with Brazilian playmaker Anderson Talisca.

Talisca, who has been on loan at Besiktas for the past two seasons, has been linked with the Reds in recent months and the Turkish club’s coach Gunes believes the 24-year-old has an agreement in place to move to Anfield.

“He [Talisca] was about to leave last winter. He will not be with us any longer because he already has an agreement with another club. He will be (the) rival of Cenk Tosun, who we sold to Everton,” he is quoted as saying on TMW.
